Class FlightAdapter

java.lang.Object
androidx.recyclerview.widget.RecyclerView.Adapter<FlightAdapter.MyRowHolder>
algonquin.cst2335.finalandroidgroupproject.FlightAdapter
public class FlightAdapter extends androidx.recyclerview.widget.RecyclerView.Adapter<FlightAdapter.MyRowHolder>
An adapter for displaying flight information in a RecyclerView.
